AboutPage.title: About Foundrr Group
AboutPage.subtitle: We are a digital product studio focused on building simple, reliable software that respects your time and ownership.
AboutPage.whoWeAre1: Foundrr Group is not a VC-backed unicorn chasing infinite growth. We are a small, independent studio of builders who believe software has become too complex, too expensive, and too rental-based.
AboutPage.whoWeAre2: We build tools that you pay for once and keep forever. No subscriptions. No login walls. Just code that solves a problem and gets out of your way.
AboutPage.philosophyDesc: We believe in the 'Boring Software' manifesto. Reliable, fast, and simple tools are better than feature-bloated platforms that change every week.
AboutPage.missionDesc: To empower freelancers and creators by giving them ownership of their digital assets, starting with their websites.
